Description: * Added an option to allow canceling abilities with the ability key to the main options page.
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Orb|alt_name=orb}} spawn delay range increased from 0.2-0.7 to 0.4-0.7
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Orb|alt_name=orb}} size increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Orb|alt_name=orb}} lag compensation buffer increased from 120ms to 140ms
* Fixed issues with denying {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} {{PageRef|Soul Orb|alt_name=orbs}}
* Fixed various other timing related bugs with {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Orb|alt_name=orbs}}
* Fixed shotguns doing too much damage to {{PageRef|Guardian}}s
* Removed the outer lanes teleporters
* Sprint increased by +0.5 for all heroes
* Removed the top of the mid arch from being able to be occupied
* Lifesteal provided by things like {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Shredder bullets now properly diminishes in stacking with other sources of lifesteal
* Fix an edge case where a player can claim the {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} but also get {{PageRef|Parry|alt_name=parried}}
* Fixed spellslinger headshots providing more bonuses than intended
* Fixed some misc mispredictions during {{PageRef|Ice Path}} movement
* Fixed {{PageRef|Ice Path}} being overly sticky for allies
* Fixed {{PageRef|Ivy}}, {{PageRef|Viscous}} and Magic Carpet moving faster than desired when holding the {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=urn}}
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} reveal time reduced from 25s to 15s
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} speed limit increased from 13 m/s to 15 m/s
* Wall Jump's behavior has been reworked so that lateral velocity is now modified by WASD movement direction into/away from the wall
* Mantle now requires pushing WASD Direction toward a ledge
* Improved Camera positions while character is backed up against walls
* When attaching to a zipline, movement direction can override the travel direction
* When holding "Jump/Mantle" after attaching to a {{PageRef|Rope|alt_name=rope}}, continue to move up the {{PageRef|Rope|alt_name=rope}}
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Health growth per boon reduced from 41 to 34
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} Heal reduced from 50 to 40
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} Heal Spirit Scaling reduced from 1.6 to 1.1
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} T2 bonus damage reduced from 100 to 80
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Crackshot}} T2 bonus damage reduced from 85 to 60
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} T2 reduced from +4s Multiplier Duration to +2.5s
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: Health Regen reduced from 3 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} cooldown increased from 15 to 24
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} T1 changed from -4s Cooldown to "Bolt Apply -25% Fire Rate for 5s"
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} T2 changed from "Bolt Apply -25% Fire Rate for 5s" to -13s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.03 to 0.024
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} Health Drain reduced from 3% to 2.3%
* Infuser: Spirit Lifesteal reduced from 20% to 15%
* Infuser: Bonus Spirit reduced from 16 to 13
